review.title: “Dream Journey from SE to Sr.GM”
review.pros: Pros – Security, On the Job training, exposed to multi-division, credit given when deserved, exposing to start-ups
review.cons: Cons – underestimates the value of their assets. Not able to take risks. Follower instead of initiator
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – keep up with market trends (new media). initiate new blood and ideas

review.title: “It's been great!”
review.pros: Pros – The work culture is pretty much like that of a start up. We work on best technologies and some very good problems and challenges. Technical teams are very brilliant. Learning and improving skills is the best part here.
review.cons: Cons – One of the main downsides here is a 3 Month notice period. Within organization getting promotion is difficult. I don't like the current process followed for development.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Please come up with some new bright ideas to take burrp to next level. Also a change is required in the currently followed software development process.
